# add2prep

The goal of add2prep is to 
save time to do data preprocessing.

## Installation

You can install the released version of add2prep from [Github](https://github.com/JiaxiangBU/add2prep) with:

```{r eval=F}
devtools::install_github('JiaxiangBU/add2prep')
```

```{r eval=F}
library(add2prep)
```

## Example

See the vignettes.
